Question
========

From a regular deck of 52 playing cards, half of which are black (13 clubs, 13 spades) and the other half red (13 hearts, 13 diamonds) a card is randomly drawn. The probability that the card drawn is clubs or red is

Answerlist
----------

* 1/4
* 26/52
* 3/4
* 1

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1/4: Incorrect
* 26/52: Incorrect
* 3/4: Correct
* 1: Incorrect
